name: dalle
description: OpenAI's DALL-E 3 - advanced AI image generation with natural language understanding and creative interpretation

authentication.instructions: Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

guidelines: Use natural, conversational language - DALL-E 3 understands context well
Be specific about the main subject and action
Describe style and artistic approach clearly
Specify important details but trust the model's creative interpretation
Use clear, unambiguous language for critical elements
Layer information: subject → action → style → mood → details
avoidances: Overly technical photography jargon (DALL-E prefers natural descriptions)

examples.engineeredPrompt: A modern, clean button icon with a play symbol. Flat design style with a gradient from bright blue to darker blue, white play triangle in the center. Simple, professional look suitable for a web interface, with subtle depth through the gradient.

A hero image for a software-as-a-service platform. The scene shows a sleek, modern 3D dashboard floating in space with a gradient background from dark blue to purple. The dashboard displays glowing charts and data visualizations. There are subtle light effects and a sense of depth and innovation. Professional, tech-forward aesthetic perfect for a website header.

A cozy coffee shop interior with warm, natural lighting. A beautifully crafted latte with foam art sits on a wooden table in the foreground, with steam rising from it. Soft afternoon sunlight streams through windows, creating a welcoming atmosphere. In the blurred background, you can see hanging lights, brick walls, and a barista at work. Photorealistic style with warm browns and ambers, focusing on the coffee with artistic depth of field.

recommendations.1024x1024: Square format - social media, icons, avatars, balanced compositions
recommendations.1024x1792: Portrait/vertical - mobile screens, posters, full-body portraits
recommendations.1792x1024: Landscape/horizontal - website headers, banners, wide scenes

recommendations.standard: Good quality, faster generation, lower cost - suitable for most use cases
recommendations.hd: Higher detail and consistency, best for professional and detailed work

recommendations.vivid: More dramatic, saturated colors and compositions - great for creative, eye-catching images
recommendations.natural: More subtle, realistic tones - better for photorealistic or documentary-style images

errorHandling.missingApiKey: OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable is not set. Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys and set it in your environment.
errorHandling.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded for OpenAI API. Please check your usage limits at https://platform.openai.com/account/limits
errorHandling.contentPolicyViolation: The prompt violated OpenAI's content policy. Please revise to remove any prohibited content (violence, adult content, etc.).
errorHandling.invalidSize: The specified size is not supported. DALL-E 3 supports: 1024x1024, 1024x1792, 1792x1024
errorHandling.billingError: Billing error with OpenAI account. Please check your payment method at https://platform.openai.com/account/billing

promptEngineering: Trust DALL-E's creative interpretation - don't over-specify technical details
Use natural, conversational descriptions rather than keyword lists
Be explicit about the most important elements
Describe the mood and feeling you want to evoke
For logos or text, be very explicit about the exact text to include
styleTransfer: Describe the visual style in terms of artistic movements or well-known styles
When analyzing references, focus on: overall aesthetic, color mood, composition approach
Translate technical visual elements to natural language descriptions
qualityVsSpeed: Use 'standard' quality for iterations and testing
Consider the 'natural' style for more photorealistic results
Use 'vivid' style for marketing and attention-grabbing visuals
